explains: v. （鸽子）发出咕咕声；柔声地说；（婴儿）满足地轻哼
int. （表示惊讶或者高兴等）唔，呀
n. 咕咕声，鸽子的叫声

sentences.en: A chief financial officer at a for-profit company may well be able to step into the CEO or COO role at a nonprofit company.
sentences.cn: 营利性企业的一位首席财务官在非营利性机构中有可能担任 CEO 或 COO。

sentences.en: The reason why the company has the titles of "President" and "COO" is to consider the operational capabilities of the senior management.
sentences.cn: 企业之所以存在“总裁”和“COO”的头衔，是考虑到了高管层的运营能力。
